archimate:Node.name: [ L1 NCSA] DMCS and Head Node, Local Scheduling and Misc ITC (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation:
This logical Node provides Provisioning for the NCSA DMCS and associated processes that constitute the "Head Node" applications and other services central to the NCSA side of the Prompt Processing System.
The Prompt Proccesing services will fail if this provisioning infrastructure fails as all applications are critical Prompt Processing. Hardware designers might consider redundant provisioning for this logical system element.
